I Am Melanie The

I specialize in Web Development

View My Work

I Specialize In

Web development

Experience

I graduated with a BSc in Computer Science and a BSc in Molecular Biology and Biotechnology. I've been web designing since 2020 and I am always exploring new technologies to make my websites more efficient for their intended use.

Skillset

I can handle high pressure, have great time-management skills, critical thinking and a strong work ethic. I work strongly within a team as well, have a demonstrated ability to lead a team through deadlines, and I can work individually and unsupervised.

Goals

I want to work for a company and team that work on clear communication. I want to align myself with a company who encourages growth and self-improvement. I am constantly learning and looking for challenging projects.

My Creative Process

My design ideas are based on internet trends and marketing advice from marketing peers.

1

Project Discussion

In depth discussion with the client to determine their business needs and the best way to achieve these needs.

2

Brainstorming

Deciding on the best tools to use to realistically bring the ideas of the client to their site.

3

Planning

This consists of designing the web interface and deciding on the tech stack that will be used to make the site functional.

4

Interaction

Now the first phase of the website will be presented to the client before it is ready to be deployed.
